hero.title: Energy beyond Earth
hero.subtitle: Precision power delivery for the space industrial revolution.

vision.title: Power abundance, not power budgets
vision.body: NEOWATT designs beamed-power infrastructure for persistent orbital, cislunar, and lunar operations. Instead of sizing missions around worst-case energy scarcity, operators can plan for sustained power availability, higher duty cycles, and faster scale-up of critical services.

problem.title: Space has a power problem
problem.body: Most missions still depend on isolated generation and storage at each asset. That drives up subsystem mass and integration complexity, limits payload, and creates downtime when demand peaks or sunlight drops. Space operations need power delivered across networks, not trapped in local budgets.

flow.label: Generation
flow.copy: High-efficiency power generation and conditioning at source nodes.
flow.infra: Orbital arrays, converters, and power management units.

flow.label: Beaming
flow.copy: Directed transmission routes energy to demand zones in real time.
flow.infra: Pointing systems, relay nodes, and network controls.
